text: Walking distance from Eunos MRT. Ladies area at level 2 i think. Beautiful mosque . I stop by during Ishak prayer ,couldn’t see the surroundings much but im sure it’s beautiful. I feel at peace here. إن شاء الله i planning to stop by here during day time so that i can see the surrounding. Full of greenery.
The Darul Aman Mosque, which is one of the landmark buildings in the Geylang area, was developed from 1984 to 1986 to replace several mosques including the Aminah Mosque.

This feedback is solely for the betterness of our mosque. The cleanliness could be much improved. The carpet looks quite old and worn out. Already the time to replace with newer & more comfortable one. Interestingly, while Masjid Darul Aman looks so huge from outside, but it feels so small once we are in. The layout of the interior could be improved further.
Needs some reno work for better toilet on ground floor ladies.

Beautiful mosque. Spacious & very malay kampong style design. Good ammenities. Located near Geylang Serai with Eunos MRT station the nearest. Parking I assume will be a little hassle during Fridays & Eids prayer.
